*0 spicy *0 dry *10 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Pecha''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]] to obtain [[Farming Points|Farm Points]]. It can be obtained as a random drop by defeating wild Pok√©mon on routes. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stage Durations ! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !!
